comments.author: pwd.mozilla@yahoo.co.uk
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.2a1pre) Gecko/20110331 Firefox/4.2a1pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.2a1pre) Gecko/20110331 Firefox/4.2a1pre

If you have a bookmark on your bookmarks toolbar and then decide that you want to clean up said toolbar by sticking some of those bookmarks into a folder on the toolbar. The folder reverts to a Windows 2000 square style temporarily.

Reproducible: Always
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.2a1pre) Gecko/20110331 Firefox/4.2a1pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.2a1pre) Gecko/20110331 Firefox/4.2a1pre

If you have a bookmark on your bookmarks toolbar and then decide that you want to clean up said toolbar by sticking some of those bookmarks into a folder on the toolbar. The folder reverts to a Windows 2000 square style temporarily.

Reproducible: Always

comments.raw_text:
Confirmed.
Blue back ground and the boundary which does not have roundness.
And All buttons which are in the right side move to several pixel right.

comments.creator: vlad.mozbugs@gmail.com
comments.text: This is still happening on  Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:6.0a1) Gecko/20110508 Firefox/6.0a1
comments.raw_text: This is still happening on  Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:6.0a1) Gecko/20110508 Firefox/6.0a1
comments.author: vlad.mozbugs@gmail.com

comments.creator: vlad.mozbugs@gmail.com
comments.text:
STR: 

1. Toggle on the bookmarks toolbar. View->Toolbars->Bookmarks Toolbar 
2. Ensure you have at least one page bookmarked in Bookmark Toolbar
3. Right click the toolbar and create a new folder 
4. Drag one bookmark onto the folder 
5. Inspect UI (specifically folder selection area)
comments.raw_text:
STR: 

1. Toggle on the bookmarks toolbar. View->Toolbars->Bookmarks Toolbar 
2. Ensure you have at least one page bookmarked in Bookmark Toolbar
3. Right click the toolbar and create a new folder 
4. Drag one bookmark onto the folder 
5. Inspect UI (specifically folder selection area)
comments.author: vlad.mozbugs@gmail.com
